content: HSL4-B Heavy-duty wedge anchor Ultimate-performance heavy-duty torque-controlled wedge anchor with approvals for concrete (carbon steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features High tensile and shear load capacity Force-controlled expansion which allows follow-up expansion Special safety cap helps ensure proper installation torque is applied even if not using a calibrated torque wrench ETA Option 1 for cracked and uncracked concrete ICC-ES/AC 193 for cracked and uncracked concrete and seismic Applications Heavy-duty fastenings in highly safety-relevant or dynamic applications, including applications in nuclear power plants Applications where extensive approval back-up or technical back-up is required, e.g. machines, heavy equipment, steel columns, heavy pipe supports, pumps, beam supports, medical equipment, cantilevers, cranes, car hoists, etc. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated, Zinc plated (min. 5 microns) Head configuration: Safety cap (Torque limitation nut) Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated, Zinc plated (min. 5 microns) | Head configuration | Safety cap (Torque limitation nut) | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2237422 - Anchor HSL4-B M12 d18x121 5/-/- - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSL-4-B M 12/5 Heavy-duty anchor assy - 2237421 - Anchor HSL4-B M12 d18x141 25/-/- - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: -
